fields.name: Building_Permit_Confirmation_Display
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation

﻿If any of the information below is incorrect, use Previous to navigate to the appropriate section and update the incorrect information.

value.stringValue: Application Type, Applicant Details, Building Permit Details, Project Valuation, Application Location

fields.name: Building_Permit_Confirmation_Footer
fields.fieldText: To stop your application and continue at a later date, click Pause.
